content.question: The famine described in the song was a consequence of which of the following?

choices.label: The civil war between the Bolsheviks and their opponents
The drive to modernize the Soviet economy
The implementation of the New Economic Policy
The onset of the Great Depression

content.answer: The drive to modernize the Soviet economy

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
